idea-plugin.name: Polopoly Importer
idea-plugin.description: Plugin to import content XML to Polopoly, or any service that accepts HTTP PUT requests for that matter. This version keeps state on application-level, not on project level.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 0.4 recurse files in alphabetic order less notifications about successful imports 0.3 do imports asynchronously to avoid hanging IDE 0.2 fixed configuration storage 0.1 initial release
